Title: Extends the term and authority of the independent monitor for the Orange county industrial development agency and modifies the applicability of certain tax exemptions based on population
Summary: Extends the term and authority of the independent monitor for the Orange county industrial development agency; requires such monitor also monitor the Orange county funding corporation; modifies the applicability of certain tax exemptions based on population; extends provisions of law related to the independent monitor for the Orange county industrial development agency.
LawCode: Amd §§912 & 912-b, ren §912 to be §912-b, Gen Muni L; amd §54, Exec L; amd Part III §3, Chap 58 of 2023
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the executive law, in relation to extending the term and authority of the independent monitor for the Orange county industrial development agency, and modifying the applicability of certain tax exemptions based on population; to amend part III of chapter 58 of the laws of 2023, amending the general municipal law and the executive law relating to directing the state inspector general to appoint an independent monitor for the Orange county industrial development agency, in relation to the effectiveness thereof; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof
